data.title: Deja Vu (A Musical Retrospective of Crosby, Stills, Nash & Young) – 4PM SHOW
data.text:
Join us on Father’s Day, June 16th, at 4 pm for an unforgettable journey with Deja Vu, as they pay tribute to the iconic supergroup Crosby, Stills, Nash & Young.

In the first set, Deja Vu will take the stage to recreate the magic of Neil Young’s legendary “After the Gold Rush” album. Rolling Stone called this landmark recording a Masterpiece and it solidified Neil’s status as one of the greatest singer songwriters of our generation.

The second set will be a thrilling performance of the iconic “Deja Vu” album in its entirety, another classic album released in 1970 by the legends themselves. Déjà Vu is the second studio album by Crosby, Stills & Nash, and their first as a quartet with Neil Young and is generally regarded as one the greatest albums in rock history!

Immerse yourself in the sounds of the ’70s with faithful renditions of Neil Young’s classics.

Experience the magic of the entire “Deja Vu” album, track by track, just like it was in 1970.

Revel in the timeless melodies that defined a generation, brought to you by the exceptional talent of Deja Vu.

This Father’s Day, give the gift of music and memories to your loved ones. Whether you’re a die-hard fan or introducing someone to the classics, Deja Vu’s musical retrospective is an event you won’t want to miss.

Don’t miss out on this chance to be part of a musical journey that transcends time. Secure your spot for Deja Vu’s special album show on Father’s Day. Tickets are selling fast – get yours now!

Let’s make this Father’s Day one to remember at Alvas Showroom with Deja Vu’s musical magic. See you there!
